title: Homepage Load and Hero Section Display
description: Verify that the homepage loads within acceptable time and displays the hero section including quick start guidance and feature highlights correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage URL
Check that the page loads within 2 seconds on a standard broadband connection
Verify the hero section is visible and contains quick start guide and feature highlights

title: Sidebar Navigation Expand/Collapse Functionality
description: Validate that the hierarchical sidebar navigation expands and collapses correctly and routes to the correct documentation pages.

steps.description: Locate the sidebar navigation
Click on a collapsible section in the sidebar
Confirm the section expands showing nested links
Click on a nested documentation topic link
Verify navigation to the correct documentation page and active page highlighting in the sidebar
Click the same collapsible section to collapse it
Confirm the section collapses hiding nested links

title: Full-Text Local Search with Keyboard Shortcut
description: Ensure the full-text search is accessible via keyboard shortcut Ctrl/Cmd+K, returns accurate results, and highlights matching terms.

steps.description: Load any documentation page
Press Ctrl+K (or Cmd+K on Mac) to open search
Search input is focused and visible
Enter a relevant search query that exists in markdown content
Verify search results are returned and include documents containing the query
Check that query terms are highlighted in the search results
Navigate the search results using keyboard arrows
Focused search result is visually distinct and can be selected via Enter key
Select a search result
User is navigated to the correct documentation page with query highlights present

title: Dark Mode Toggle and Persistence
description: Verify that the dark mode toggle works, respects system theme detection on initial load, and persists user choice across sessions.

steps.description: Load the documentation site with system theme set to light mode
Site loads in light mode by default
Manually enable dark mode using toggle
Site switches to dark mode appearance immediately
Refresh the page
Dark mode remains enabled after refresh
Set system theme to dark and clear local preference
Reload the site
Site loads in dark mode automatically respecting system preference

title: Mobile Responsiveness and Touch Navigation
description: Check the documentation site's responsiveness on various mobile screen sizes and verify touch-friendly navigation usability.

steps.description: Load the site on viewport sizes ranging from 320px to 768px width
Layout adjusts correctly to mobile screen sizes without horizontal scrolling
Open the mobile navigation menu using touch or tap
Mobile navigation menu opens smoothly and sections can be expanded or collapsed
Navigate to multiple pages via mobile navigation
Navigation is fluid and pages load correctly without errors
Test scrolling and tap interactions within the content area
Touch events respond correctly and user experience is smooth

title: GitHub Integration 'Edit this page' Links
description: Verify that all 'Edit this page' links correctly direct to the corresponding markdown file on GitHub repository.

steps.description: Navigate to multiple documentation pages
Locate the 'Edit this page on GitHub' link
Confirm the link URL corresponds to the correct markdown file path in GitHub repository
Click the edit link
Verify redirection to GitHub with the editable markdown file open

title: Syntax Highlighting and Code Copy Functionality
description: Ensure TypeScript and JavaScript code samples have syntax highlighting with line numbers and copy-to-clipboard button functions correctly.

steps.description: Open various pages containing TypeScript and JavaScript code samples
Verify syntax highlighting is applied correctly with appropriate color and style
Check that line numbers are visible for code blocks
Click on the copy-to-clipboard button on a code block
Confirm code content is copied to clipboard successfully

title: Auto-Generated Table of Contents Accuracy
description: Verify the table of contents is auto-generated correctly based on page headings and links navigate to correct sections.

steps.description: Open documentation pages with multiple heading levels
Check that the table of contents reflects all headings hierarchically
Click table of contents entries
Verify page scrolls to the correct heading section

title: SEO and Content Discoverability Verification
description: Ensure that pages include proper meta tags, titles, descriptions, and structured content to meet SEO standards.

steps.description: Inspect multiple documentation page source code
Verify presence of relevant meta title and meta description tags
Check structured markup such as schema.org or open graph tags where applicable
Confirm URLs are semantic and user-friendly

title: Accessibility Compliance WCAG AA
description: Validate documentation site accessibility with keyboard navigation, color contrast, and screen reader compatibility to meet WCAG AA standards.

steps.description: Navigate through the site using keyboard only (Tab, Shift+Tab, Enter, arrow keys)
Focus order follows logical reading order and interactive elements are reachable
All text and UI elements meet color contrast ratio requirements
Use a screen reader to navigate main sections of the documentation site
Content is read correctly with meaningful alt texts and ARIA labels where applicable

title: Local Development Workflow Build and Hot Reload
description: Verify that local content edits in markdown files are reflected immediately via hot module replacement and that the site builds without errors.

steps.description: Start local development server with hot reload enabled
Confirm server starts without build errors
Modify a markdown file used in documentation
Verify changes appear immediately in the local preview via hot reload without full page refresh
Stop the development server and run full build process
No build errors occur and static assets are generated successfully

title: Performance Metrics Compliance
description: Ensure the documentation site meets performance targets such as First Contentful Paint (FCP) under 1.5 seconds and Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS) below 0.1.

steps.description: Open homepage and select various documentation pages
Measure FCP and confirm it is less than 1.5 seconds
Measure CLS and verify it is below 0.1
Page loads fully within 2 seconds on standard broadband
